title: [failed] TC-US001-04: When commit fails due to pre-commit hook, error message includes `Pre-commit hook failed:\n` plus hook output
description:
Test case TC-US001-04 resulted in status: failed.
Notes: The 6 existing tests in approve-prototype.test.ts all pass (bun test exit code 0), but none exercise the pre-commit hook failure message format.
Evidence: approve-prototype.ts:114-118 throws 'Failed to create prototype approval commit: ${commitResult.stderr || "git commit command failed."}' on commit failure. FR-3 requires the error to be wrapped as 'Pre-commit hook failed:\n<hook output>'. Implementation does not apply that prefix; no test covering this scenario exists in approve-prototype.test.ts.
Correlated requirements: US-001, FR-3
